name: Monstrously Delicious!
description:
Monstrously Delicious

The game was inspired by pacifist speed runs and Don't Starve. It is an infinite survival game where you must cook your enemies to survive... And feed them to customers...

This game was created to compete in the Quad Jam gaming competition, following its theme (Don't kill anything!)

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Click to hit
    • Enemies, if hit, will go away from you

How to survive:

  • Cook the monsters
  • Eat the food
  • Feed the hungry customers!

Contributors:

Music: CDplaya

Code: coder620

Art: J Tubes

Should we continue developing?

Please comment and tell us what you think of the game. There is a lot of room for improvement. Tell me if you like the direction.
